jd: From: koshal arora, tanisha systems koshal@tanishasystems.com Reply to: koshal@tanishasystems.com Database Administrator 5 - SQL ServerLancing MIOnsite and local onlyNeed local candidate onlyTop Skills & Years of Experience:• 7+ years of Database administration specifically on SQL Server 16 and upwards.• Expertise in HA and DR solutions.• Transparent Data Encryption within SQL Server.• Over 3+ years of experience creating, updating and maintaining systems documentation.Interview Process:Virtual Interview via MS Teams video. Please use laptop and be prepared so share screen if asked. Use of headphones is strongly discouraged. Please do NOT use ChatGPT or any other AI assistance during virtual interviews. A screenshot photo of candidate will be required for any interviews as well as a vendor present at beginning of interview to validate candidate. Any second-round interviews will be held in person at the Lansing office. Remote or On-site:Candidates MUST be local to greater Lansing area (commutable distance). We are not interested in candidates who will need to relocate to accept the position. Will need to be onsite starting day 1 for hybrid work schedule which is onsite 2-days a week. NO REMOTE ONLY OPTION.
